categories: Category:Sith in the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: This Sith apprentice was present when Vestara Khai was in the Circle of Lords. He Took Vestara's training lightsaber and gave her a Sith lightsaber. He was also a member of the Lost Tribe of Sith. He wore black robes and a bright red sash that marked him as an apprentice.
